feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [DC][HostedPrivateCloud] - Network equipement operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 20, 03:00 - 07:00 UTC

Jun 20, 22:04 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 20/07/2023 03:00 UTC
End time : 20/07/2023 07:00 UTC
Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment.

entry.title: [Global][VMwarePrivateCloud] - vSphere management access
entry.content:
Jun 26, 14:26 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 25/06/2023 15:45 UTC
End Time : 26/06/2023 13:10 UTC
Root cause : DNS resolution malfunction
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 26, 08:49 UTC
Identified - Start time : 25/06/2023 15:45 UTC
Service impact : vSphere management access might be down
Root cause : DNS resolution malfunction
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [Global][HostedPrivateCloud] - VMware vCenter Server upgrade
entry.content:
Jun 26, 06:53 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 26, 06:50 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 26/06/2023 06:45 UTC
End time : 04/08/2023 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Management unavailable for 1h30 at one time.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for VMware vCenter Server services. An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private CLoud] - R802R16/R802R17/R802R18
entry.content:
Jun 22, 09:20 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 22/06/2023 08:59 UTC
End time: 22/06/2023 09:20 UTC
Service impact : Some servers were temporarily unavailable in racks R802R16, R802R17 and R802R18
Root cause: A cooling issue caused the incident
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
